article_title: Scheckler: Stranded, with no good 'Net choice

og.description: Every year when National Public Radio starts its big on-air drive, my blood pressure rises - not because of our local NPR affiliate, WVTF, but because of the assumption by the station manager that I have decent Internet access at home.
og.title: Scheckler: Stranded, with no good 'Net choice
